Package ch.emf.Application_Demonstration.ctrl

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
ch.emf.Application_Demonstration.ctrl.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
IControllerForServiceController, IControllerForServiceThymio, IControllerForView
public class Controller extends Object implements IControllerForView, IControllerForServiceController, IControllerForServiceThymio
The Controller class is responsible for managing the interactions between the view and the services. It implements multiple interfaces to provide various functionalities to the view and service layers. This class follows the Singleton design pattern to ensure only one instance of the controller exists.
Version:
1.0
Author:
YerlyT04
